review: The device works well, however in my country Costa Rica has very few options available, because most are restricted by geographical reasons. This seems to me a great discrimination that paying the same price as an USA citizen, do not have the same rights. In this case they should prevent those items are sold by Amazon outside the United States, as they do with other products.

author: Amazon Customer

review: I'm writing this review on my iPhone from the same spot in my home, and on the same WIFI network connection, that I had planned to use the Amazon Fire TV Stick. Unlike my phone, the Firestick was unable to connect to www.amazon.com despite repeated attempts using different locations in the room. Thankfully, Best Buy excepted the return with issue. Thanks for wasting two hours of my life Amazon. If it has to be in the same room as the router why not just sell a wired version?
author: James P. Girardeau "jim in savannah"

review: Great price/value but drops the internet connect a fair amount. Also the Amazon prime interface for my Samsung TV is better than on the fire stick. But the price is hard to beat. I just would think Amazon would have a piece of hardware that did not drop the WiFi connection so much.
